column4: passed away in his home in tampa florida. he was preceded in death by his parents thomas murray andrews sr. and mother lucille helene franckenbusch
column5: and brother charles christopher andrews. he is survived by his loving partner jennifer j bressard and son thomas (tj) joshua bressard
column6: and 2 grandsons elijah and pierce. 5 sisters and 3 brothers. thomas was a gentle giant
column7: whos heart was as big as his smile. tommy worked hard and cared about everyone in his life. all who have known tommy are heartbroken over loosing such a bright life force. for memorial information
column8: please go to memories of tommy on facebook
